data.title: GIS Fundamentals Foundation Certification Exam
data.meta_description: Is a GIS Fundamentals Certification Exam part of your certification journey? If so, this article presents the details related to the exam, its unique versions, and exam development opportunities.
data.text:
This article provides you with a quick look at key information unique to this exam, level, and version. As always, our key exam resources are the Exam Information Guide and Learning Plan located on the Exam Details Page in the Esri Academy and ArcGIS Documentation. We recommend that you subscribe to this article to receive updates on this certification exam and click this link to Ask Questions.

Current Version: GIS Fundamentals Foundation 2024

The 2024 exam version is a foundation level exam. The GIS Fundamentals exam is designed for candidates with 150 hours of GIS coursework or 3-6 months of GIS workplace experience.

Exam Details Page in the Esri Academy Catalog (includes links to the Exam Information Guide and the exam Learning plan)

ArcGIS Pro and ArcGIS Online – ArcGIS Documentation/Resources

Level: Foundation

Publish Date: 22 April 2024

Exam State: Available to the public

Link to exam’s Credly digital badge

Exam Version Enhancements

Re-evaluated the expertise recommendation hours

Reviewed all sections and objectives to ensure they properly align with the latest software versions

Previous Version: GIS Fundamentals Foundation 2201 – Retired 30 June 2024

The 2201 version is a foundation level exam and retired 30 June 2024. Read our Retirement Policy here, view our Exam Retirement Policy FAQs article here, and view the exam retirement schedule here.

Level: Foundation

Version: 2201

Published date: May 2022

Retired date: June 2024

Exam State: Retired

Exam Version Comparison

Number of questions, exam duration, software version:

2024 Version: 75 questions, 1 hour and 30-minutes to complete

Software: ArcGIS Online (workflows as of October 2023), ArcGIS Pro (3.x), Living Atlas

2201 Version: 65 questions, 1 hour 30 minutes to complete

Software: ArcGIS Online, ArcGIS Pro, Navigation tools (eg: Explorer tools, Add data, Select, Search, etc.)

Adjustments reflect blueprint survey feedback due to change in software versions and number of questions. Learn about blueprint surveys here

We hope you will engage with us during the next exam update process

Exams are updated every 18-24 months; we eagerly invite you to join us when we create the next exam version. Your participation is critical to the success of our program, your advice and expertise is key to ensuring that the exam enhancements meet the needs of our GIS Industry.
